Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to enforce assigned privileges of authenticated users
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: GPO restrictions on HMI operator accounts (NET-2A-TC209), service account permissions tested (NET-2A-TC208)

Requirement Description: Enforce authorization for all users (human, software process, device) to all protected functions
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: GPO applied to operator accounts, service accounts have defined permissions
Service accounts defined but role-based access control (RBAC) not explicitly documented

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to prevent further access after a period of inactivity

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to generate audit records
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: LibreNMS monitoring with alert generation, audit logging mentioned for security events

Requirement Description: Provide capability for centrally managed audit trail
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: LibreNMS centralized monitoring, event logs synchronized via NTP (NET-2A-TC301)

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to allocate audit record storage capacity
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: Audit logging mentioned but storage capacity allocation not documented

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to support a defined response to audit processing failures
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: Not explicitly addressed in test specification

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to generate timestamps for use in audit records
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: NTP synchronization tested (NET-2A-TC301) for accurate timestamps

Requirement Description: Synchronize time with authoritative time source
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: NTP authentication and synchronization with AT NTP server (NET-2A-TC301)

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to determine whether a given individual took a particular action
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: Audit logging present but digital signatures/non-repudiation mechanisms not documented

Requirement Name: Use of physical diagnostic and test interfaces
Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to authorize and control use of physical diagnostic and test interfaces
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: Physical access to devices tested but authorization controls for physical interfaces not documented
